:py:mod:`database.database_init`
================================

.. py:module:: database.database_init

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Database initialization based on the engine and PythonAccounting models.



Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   database.database_init.database_init



.. py:function:: database_init() -> None

   Initializes the database by setting up all tables that do not currently exist.

   :returns: None
